#labels Phase-Implementation
The file format is define as follows

{{{
Data_File ::= ( Graph )+
Graph ::= ( Node )+ newline
Node ::= l_id white_space type ( white_space offset )* ( white_space f_id )* newline
}}}

The data flow for each graph is define as follows

{{{
Graph ::= Length ( Node )+
Node ::= l_id (f_id)* type ( offset )*
}}}
